mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO bot.trade_history_${tag} ( tranId, price, symbol, qty, quoteQty, isBestMatch, isBuyerMaker, time ) VALUES ( #{tranId}, #{price}, #{symbol}, #{qty}, #{quoteQty}, #{isBestMatch}, #{isBuyerMaker}, #{time} )
mapper.select:
SELECT id, tranId, price, symbol, qty, quoteQty, isBestMatch, isBuyerMaker, time FROM bot.trade_history_${tag} WHERE 1=1
AND time >= #{start} AND time <= #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trade_volume_report ( symbol, volume, avg_price, date_hour) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'apt', SUM(qty) qty, AVG(price), LEFT(FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(`time`, 10)), 16) AS date_hour FROM trade_history_apt WHERE `time` >= CONCAT(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 day )), '000') GROUP BY LEFT(FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(`time`, 10)), 16) ) A ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE volume = A.qty, updated_at = now()
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(A.volume / B.volume) FROM (SELECT volume FROM trade_volume_report WHERE symbol = 'apt' ORDER BY id DESC limit 1) A, (SELECT volume FROM trade_volume_report WHERE symbol = 'apt' ORDER BY id DESC limit 1,1) B
